headline: Edison International (EIX): Among the Best High Yield Stocks to Buy in April for Dividend Capture
summary: We recently published a list of Dividend Capture Strategy: 15 High Yield Stocks to Buy in April. headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in Edison International of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - EIX
summary: NEW YORK, March 31, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Edison International  .  Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...
